title: Constructivist Remote Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Modeling language-based instructional design supporting constructivist learning activities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to solve real-life problems through science concept modeling based on constructivist principles.
Learners construct self-directed learning environments using tools based on EML (Educative Modeling Language).
Learners reflect on and improve the process of science knowledge construction through peer feedback and collaborative activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
